name: Acuity Scheduling Trigger
semantic_context: Handle Acuity Scheduling events via webhooks
natural_language_description: 这是 Acuity Scheduling Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Acuity Scheduling events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

event.name: event
available_options: appointment.canceled (值: appointment.canceled) - Is called whenever an appointment is canceled
appointment.changed (值: appointment.changed) - Is called when the appointment is changed in any way
appointment.rescheduled (值: appointment.rescheduled) - Is called when the appointment is rescheduled to a new time
appointment.scheduled (值: appointment.scheduled) - Is called once when an appointment is initially booked
order.completed (值: order.completed) - Is called when an order is completed

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default does the webhook-data only contain the ID of the object. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default does the webhook-data only contain the ID of the object. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True
